duties_responsibilities.duty: Cash handling, fuel transactions, cleaning, and stocking as part of the role with food prep and foodservice safety for some foodservice positions.
Provide excellent customer service to customers visiting the store.
Maintain a clean, safe environment to ensure the store is customer ready.
Ensure proper food preparation, presentation, cash handling, fuel transactions, and promoting rewards loyalty program.
Ability to multi-task, perform repeated bending, standing, and reaching, and lift up to 50 pounds occasionally.
